label: 度会延佳
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1615-90). [A] priest attached to the Outer Shrine (gekū) of the Ise Shrine, who endeavored to reform Ise Shrine, who endeavored to reform Ise Shinto as it was established in the medieval period (p. 416). [外宮、伊勢神宮、伊勢神道]
